modShortDescription: Simple changes I typically put on all Kitten Me Gaming servers before launch. Just some tweaks to things that improve some areas of the game that I felt needed some love.
modDescription:
Simple changes I typically put on all Kitten Me Gaming servers before launch. Just some tweaks to things that improve some areas of the game that I felt needed some love.

## Ratbertts Quality of Life 1.0

### Stack Sizes Changes

**Food Items**

Following [stack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-stack-size/) up to 500 (up from 125)

* Blueberries
* Corn
* Super Corn
* Potato
* Mushrooms
* Yucca Fruit
* [Pumpkin](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/)
* Raw Meat

**Medical Items**

Following stack up to 10 (up from 5)

* Bandage
* First Aid Bandage
* First Aid Kit

Following stack up to 20 (up from 10)

* Splint
* Vitamins
* [Painkillers](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-medical-supplies/)
* HerbalAntibiotics
* Antibiotics

Following stack up to 30 (up from 15)

Blood Bag

### Recipe Changes

* Added Recipe for stone arrow that uses cloth instead of feather (both exist, and added bundle recipe)
* Added Recipe for stone [crossbow](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) bolt that uses cloth instead of feather (both exist, and added bundle recipe)
* Added all dyes to chem bench so you can craft them if you donâ€™t want to wait to find them in loot (now under their own category on bench)
* Modified all starting meet recipes to reduce meats.  
   * Bacon and Eggs down to 3 meats (from 5)  
   * Boiled, Charred, Grilled meats down to 2 (from 5)
* All [seed](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-farming/) recipes reduced from 5 items to 3 items to craft a seed. Example: 3 corn makes 1 seed
* Changed First Aid Kit, replaced beer with medical aloe cream instead

## Ratbertts Quality of Life 1.2 Updates

* Added an admin concrete block that is not destroyable (for admins building public areas)
* Modified gas generators to hold up to 2k in gas and provide a bit more [electrical](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-electricity/) output.
* Improved spear dmg in perk tree Javelin Master
* Improved the durability of electric fence posts from 250 to 500
* Added working jail doors to crafting
* Added Beaker to crafting
* Added Battery Acid to crafting (improved looting is still in mod, but commented out if you wish to re-add the increased battery acid spawns, you can)
* Made player purchased vending machines more difficult to destroy, best if used with Admin Concrete block(because trolls)
* Added eggs to fridges for looting

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YreEdcZ5x2XJubi0CGPkMH9C-jcyhlcE/view?usp=sharing)**

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.gg/D7MTN8RZqu).

**Credits:** [Ratbertt](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/ratbertt/)
